definition: to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: The Russian official assessed that Pyongyang was "hunkering down for a succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯官员认为朝鲜会坚守继承的传统。

sentences.english: Inherits people of the past's theory more and say the nourish the spirit develops a mature stage.
sentences.chinese: 韩愈继承前人学说，把养气说发展到成熟阶段。

sentences.english: Heir to an industrial past, the region has turned towards tourism.
sentences.chinese: 曾经工业的继承者，而如今这里已转向旅游业。

sentences.english: Mr. Gilbert's heir inherited the house and a large sum of money.
sentences.chinese: 吉伯特先生的继承人继承了房子和一大笔钱。

sentences.english: Mr. Gilbert's heir inherited the house and a large sum of money.
sentences.chinese: 吉伯特先生的继承人继承了房子和一大笔钱。

sentences.english: He was motivated by the hope of fathering a male heir to the Tudor Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他这样做是为了都铎王朝能有一名男性继承人。

sentences.english: The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom.
sentences.chinese: 强盗劫持了女继承人并向她索取赎金。

sentences.english: It is effectively a way to overcome the limitation of single-inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 这是绕过单一继承限制的一个有效途径。

sentences.english: It also inherits open source tooling for management and backup.
sentences.chinese: 它还继承了用于管理和备份的开放源码工具。

sentences.english: Is laborious don't become you to meditation emperor house after ambition make your son inherit?
sentences.chinese: 难不成你以为帝家以后会让你儿子继承吗？

sentences.english: The system of property inheritance is an important part of our civil law.
sentences.chinese: 财产继承制度是我国民法的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Women in the MENA have the right to inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 中东与北非地区的妇女具有遗产继承权。

sentences.english: In a car accident, he saved his estate company heir Jiang village.
sentences.chinese: 在一场车祸中，他救下了江氏地产公司继承人江村。

sentences.english: Tracy: She's an heiress to the Johnson & Johnson fortune.
sentences.chinese: 她是强生公司的女继承人。

sentences.english: I will not have this slave-girl's son sharing the inheritance with my son Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 我不许这女奴的儿子分享我儿以撒的继承权。

sentences.english: After grandpa croaked, I inherited his pickup truck.
sentences.chinese: 祖父过世后我继承了他的小卡车。
